coref: One bright evening as the sun was sinking on a glorious world a wise old Cock flew into a tree to roost. Before he composed he to rest, he flapped he wings three times and crowed loudly. But just as he was about to put he head under he wing, he beady eyes caught a flash of red and a glimpse of a long pointed nose, and there just below he stood Master Fox. Have you heard the wonderful news? cried Master Fox in a very joyful and excited manner. the wonderful news?, asked a wise old Cock very calmly. But a wise old Cock had a queer, fluttery feeling inside a wise old Cock. for, you know, a wise old Cock was very much afraid of Master Fox. Your family and mine and all other animals have agreed to forget Your family and mine and all other animals differences and live in peace and friendship from now on forever. Just think of it!, I simply cannot wait to embrace you! Do come down, dear friend, and let us celebrate the joyful event. How grand!, said a wise old Cock,I certainly am delighted at the wonderful news. But a wise old Cock spoke in an absent way, and stretching up on tiptoes, seemed to be looking at something afar off. What is it you see? ,asked Master Fox Master Fox a little anxiously. Why, it looks to Master Fox like a couple of Dogs coming this way. a couple of Dogs must have heard the wonderful news and But Master Fox Master Fox did not wait to hear more. Off Master Fox started on a run. Wait, cried a wise old Cock. Why do you run?,The Dogs are friends of yours now! Yes, answered Master FoxMaster Fox. But Dogs might not have heard the wonderful news. Besides, I have a very important errand that I had almost forgotten about. a wise old Cock smiled as a wise old Cock buried a wise old Cock head in a wise old Cock feathers and went to sleep, for a wise old Cock had succeeded in outwitting a very crafty enemy.
